description:
Inside of us all there is a deep driving desire to simply be ourselves and to make a difference in the world.

Sadly many of us are conditioned out of this and end up simply living an inauthentic life.

" Authenticity is about seeing who you are,accepting who you are and then making it even better" Vikas Malkani

Vikas shares important and valuable tips to bring out your best self and to be celebrated for the person that you are.

It leaves you with strong self belief and removes self doubt.

Find the real you, celebrate that and discover a whole new authentic life.
title: Happy being me! How to be Authentic and happy.
instructors: Vikas Malkani & Sally Forrest, SoulCentre Academy
